dsr-product: Lock your DAI with Maker and earn interest.
create-proxy-desc: In order to use Savings and other features, you will need a wallet proxy.
permissions-desc: This permission allows Oasis to interact with the Dai in your wallet.
balance-insufficient: Not enough DAI in your balance
tos-desc: By creating a Savings pot, I accept Oasis
wyre-desc: Wyre is a secure bridge between fiat currencies and cryptocurrency.
moonpay-desc: The new standard for fiat to crypto.
onramp-leave-message: By clicking buy, you will leave Oasis and be redirected to a third party website where you will complete the buy process.
connect-error: Please authorize this website to access your Ethereum account.
wyre-purchase-description-recent-failed: Failed to purchase {{ order }} with Wyre
moonpay-purchase-description-recent-fail: Failed to purchase {{ order }} with Moonpay
erc20-approve-description-recent-failed: Failed to unlock transfer of {{ token }}
erc20-disapprove-description-recent-fail: Failed to lock transfer of {{ token }}
dsr-proxy-deposit-description-recent-fai: Failed to deposit {{ amount }} DAI to DSR
dsr-proxy-withdraw-description-recent-fa: Failed to withdraw {{ amount }} DAI from DSR
dsr-deposit-permissions: This permission allows Oasis to interact with the Dai in your wallet.
dsr-withdraw-error-greater-than-deposit: Amount is greater than DAI deposited
ledger-error: There was an error, please reset
trezor-error: There was an error, please reset

hero.headline: Dai is a digital dollar for everyone. Buy, send, and manage it in one place.

1.title: 1 DAI = 1 USD
1.description: Buy Dai from your bank account in minutes.

2.title: Send to anyone
2.description: Transfer funds as fast and easy as sending a message.

3.title: Grow your savings
3.description: Choose from the best rates, no minimums and withdraw anytime.

4.title: You’re in control
4.description: Only you can access the funds in your account.

borrow.title: Open a Maker Vault
borrow.description: Utilize your collateral by generating Dai against it.

wallet.title: Choosing a wallet
wallet.description: Our guide will help you pick the right wallet for you.
